pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Oil Body Butter 150g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Coconut Oil Formula Body Butter is more indulgent than the Palmer's® Coconut Oil Formula Body Lotion. Coconut Oil and Shea Butter combines in this thick, rich and nourishing body butter. With Vitamin E, it's perfect for when your skin is feeling extra dry or in need of extra pampering.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

Common Uses

The convenient jar makes it perfect for travel, with a Coconut and Monoi scent, transporting you to a tropical paradise. Provides 24 hour moisture. Paraben and Phthalate Free.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Urea, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Propylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Bentonite, Palmatic Acid, Stearyl Alcohol, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Tocopherol, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Tocopherol Acetate, Prunus Amygdalus Dukis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Ethylhexylglycerin, Titanium Dioxide (CI77891), Stearic Acid, Myristyl Alcohol, Lauryl Alcohol, Sodium Sulfite, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Bezyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Benzyl Alcohol.

Directions

Apply as needed, or when your skin needs extra moisturisation.
